Title: WPF Folder Browser
Description: A folder browser for WPF similiar to the one found in Windows forms. This project references the Prism Patterns & Practices library
HomeWiki:
Project Description

This is a folder browser for WPF similiar to the one found in Windows forms. WPF currently does not provide a Folder browser dialog and the only thing near enough is the Microsoft.Win32.OpenFileDialog class in WPF's PresentationFramework.dll assembly which lets users specify multiple files to open.



This project does not use any Windows API, it does require a reference to the Prism Patterns & Practices library
